score: 1 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Spaceballs is to Star Wars as Galaxy Quest is to Star Trek = hilarious quirky spoofs! If you enjoyed Spaceballs then Galaxy Quest should be right up your alleyway.Galaxy Quest is one of the best sci-fi comedies ever made. It is an underrated film in my opinion. Comedy lovers as well as Star Trek fans should enjoy this film. I love it! If you liked 'Mars Attacks!', 'Spaceballs' 'Men in Black' or even films like 'Airplane' and 'Naked Gun' then you really should watch Galaxy Quest - you are sure to get a few laughs out of the film.9/10

score: 0 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Mars Attacks! is by far one of the zaniest comedies I have ever seen. I laughed hard when I watched this film for the first time - I could not believe how incredibly wacky the characters are. The funny lines and crazy sight gags are sure to please those that are into odd-ball comedies. The movie is 'far out'.This movie has a strange feel to it - as if it belongs in with some of the 50's 60's or even 70's science fiction films. That is a compliment to the film makers.If you liked movies such as 'Galaxy Quest', 'Spaceballs', 'Airplane', 'Monty Python and the Holy Grail', or 'The Man With Two Brains' then it's a good chance you will like Mars Attacks! 9/10

score: 0 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Airplane! Is a twisted timeless comedy masterpiece. There are several sight gags with a lot of bizarre humor. When you pop this movie on, get ready because the &!it has just hit the fan (watch the film to understand what I mean). This movie was a top-notch hit when it came out and it is still one of the best films of it's kind.If you like the movie Airplane! then I would recommend you watch this zany cast in Airplane II The Sequel. Other films you might enjoy with similar quirky humor 'Mars Attacks!', 'Galaxy Quest', 'Dracula Dead And Loving It', 'Spaceballs' or 'Time Bandits'.I still love all these classic comedy films - and Airplane! still tops my list as one of the funniest.10/10
